thread.title: Wherever you go in the world, you’d surely find one Mahatma Gandhi statue!
thread.title_full: Wherever you go in the world, you’d surely find one Mahatma Gandhi statue!

title: Wherever you go in the world, you’d surely find one Mahatma Gandhi statue!
text:
2nd October is known as Mahatma Gandhi’s birth anniversary around the World. His enormous efforts for India ’s freedom are known till now. These efforts and dedication made him earn the title of the Father of nation, in India. 
However, his life was also scrutinized under lot of controversies. But, despite of this his efforts for helping India in achieving independence cannot be ignored. His prime principle of following Ahimsa, helped him gain respect even from the enemies. 

1. Mahatma Gandhi's statue in Japan.
